name: Can't stop shooting!
description:
Hero's arm cannon has jammed so you can't stop shooting. You have to go back to your home to fix it without hurting the civilians on your way.

Controls: Arrows = move and aim
                      Z = Jump

                      Up = Open your house door   
                      R = Restart the level         

Music and sound effects I used

                                                    

https://freesound.org/people/LittleRobotSoundFactory/sounds/270343/
